attributes.action: Demand Labour Party release Forde Report due to be published 2 years ago.
attributes.additional_details:
The General Secretary of the Party has the report but has failed to release findings. There have been so many requests to the Party which have been completely ignored.
I know of no other way to compel Labour Party to release findings of the enquiry
attributes.background: If required number of signatures obtained, I’d want Government & Parliament to question Labour Party about the delay. A debate in Parliament as to why the report has been shelved and MP’s & Staffers named as miscreants allowed back into Party without disciplinary action.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the publication of reports by a political party are a matter for that party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
